item.title: Video Editing for E-Commerce Brand - Meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce brand that is focused on expanding its creative department.

We are looking for a video editor for creating and editing video ads for Meta and TikTok.  Initially this will be a trial period but there is opportunity for a long term relationship as our company grows.  

We are an apparel company that sells fishing t-shirts.  The videos will all be video ads for Meta and TikTok advertising.  This will include post production of UGC ads, and creating video ads from scratch.

The Video Editor needs to have experience in creating direct-response video ads. These videos need to be fast-paced short videos that hold attention throughout. Our video ads range from 15 seconds to 45 seconds.

Some ads will include voice-overs as well as captions, and some videos will have fast-paced titles that need to be animated creatively into the composition.

Responsibilities:
Receiving RAW clips, identifying usable footage from supplied storyboard and editing an on-brand video for our company.

Knowledge of all social media aspect ratios for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

Produce edited videos that don't only look good, but actually sell the product

Skills and Experience
3+ years of experience with video editing
These are product-focused videos, so marketing knowledge is needed
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively on multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment in which tight deadlines cannot be missed.
Strong concept experience in both video and digital environments.
Strong attention to detail and awareness of project scope, delivery dates, and content objectives.
Must be proficient in Premiere Pro & After Effects
Must be able to think conceptually and exceptionally to tell visual stories and push boundaries.
Must have great communication and storytelling skills to convey your approach and techniques to internal team members.
Must be knowledgeable about the latest marketing techniques and visual trends.
Good knowledge of video effects and unique stylized transitions


When you apply make sure you let us know why you think you're a good fit and also send us overall relevant examples that you have!

You MUST include a portfolio with direct-response marketing videos that were used on Facebook, Instagram and TikTok.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Content Creator To Make TikTok Videos for Puzzle Game - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a highly-motivated person to make amazing videos of our product to post on TikTok. This is an ongoing job: you will work with us over several months on multiple videos, as we try to improve the performance of the videos and grow our brand.

The product is a puzzle game. You will first need to master actually solving these puzzles, but they're fun!

Then, you will work on creating compelling videos that could get a lot of views on TikTok. We will ask you to try certain ideas, angles, and approaches to the videos. We will strategize together on how to make videos that perform better.

We don't want a professional expert. We don't want someone who will "just get the job done". We don't want someone juggling many other projects.

Are you a student who spends a lot of time on TikTok and wants to make some money during the summer and learn about business? This would be great for you. It's more than fine if you're inexperienced, as long as you're coachable, motivated, and willing to learn fast.

We believe in incentivizing performance. If you can deliver amazing results, we will extend and expand your role, responsibilities, compensation, and give bonuses when you knock it out the park!

Requirements:
- You will shoot and edit the videos yourself
- You will narrate the videos with your own voice
- You should be a native English speaker
- You will NOT need to show your face or body in the videos
- You WILL need to show your hands in the videos
- We will do a weekly video-chat to check in, strategize, and discuss ideas

Ideal Candidate:
- Has extensive experience using TikTok and Social Media
- Has created UGC videos before
- Is a self-starter, creative, and eager to learn


Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00

Category: Social Media Marketing
